name: letter-3d-swap
description: 3D box letter swap animation on hover with configurable rotation direction and stagger

props.name: as
props.description: HTML element type to render as

props.name: mainClassName
props.description: CSS classes for the main container element

props.name: frontFaceClassName
props.description: CSS classes for the front face of each letter

props.name: secondFaceClassName
props.description: CSS classes for the second (reveal) face of each letter

props.name: staggerDuration
props.description: Delay between each letter's animation in seconds

props.name: staggerFrom
props.description: Direction from which the stagger effect originates

props.name: transition
props.description: Motion transition configuration for the swap animation

props.name: rotateDirection
props.description: Direction of the 3D rotation on hover
